failed-prompt.message.zh: 请检查用户名或密码是否输入正确。
failed-prompt.message.en: Unable to login. Check the username and password are correct.

login-unavailable-message.zh: 暂时无法连接到服务器，请检查网络连接是否正常，确保当前网络可以正常访问 [a1][i]{0}[/i][/a1]。
login-unavailable-message.en: Unable to load login service. Please check your Internet connection and ensure access to [i]{0}[/i] is permitted on your network. [a1]Click here to test access[/a1] to the login service.
